Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Cathlicicidin-PY analog C3A and C7A (synthetic AMPs20, UCLL1)
Sequence Information.Source: amino acid substitution, animal-derived, natural derivative

Literature.Author: Dissanayake S, He J, Yang SH, Brimble MA, Harris PWR, Cameron AJ. 2023
Literature.Title: Flow-Based Fmoc-SPPS Preparation and SAR Study of Cathelicidin-PY Reveals Selective Antimicrobial Activity.

Sequence Information.Comments: APD analysis reveals this sequence is most similar (93.1%) toCathelicidin-PYK:17%; R: 10%; L:14%, I=L=A:7%. Mol Wt: 3361.028; GRAVY: -0.53; Mol Formula: C151H264N46O39; mol ex coeff: 0.Activity: slightly less active than the WT. active against E. coli ATCC 25922 (MIC 1 uM), P. aeruginosa SVB-B9 (MIC 4 uM) in MHB, S-aureus ATCC 29213 (MIC>64 uM), and C-albicans SC5314T (MIC >64 uM).Antimicrobial robustness: salt-sensitive; active against E. coli ATCC 25922 (MIC 4 uM), P. aeruginosa SVB-B9 (MIC 32 uM) in cation-adjusted MHB media.Structure: less helical than WT. UPdated 6/2023
